name: Revelt (WallsGames)
description:
Frantic Team Multiplayer Shooter Game.

Revelt, a Multiplayer Shooter video game,

where you will fight alongside your allies in various game modes to win the game.

Join and fight in public rooms against other people or create your own private room where you can customize each game mode as you want!

Use among a wide variety of weapons with unique characteristics!

modes

*DeathMatch

*Capture Point

*CaptureFlag

boss

Party modes (Coming soon!)

*DeathRun

*Parkour

*SandBox

Contains a wide variety of weapons, maps and cosmetic items!
